alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 8:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, southern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 817 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bainbridge, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Havana, Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Darsey, Concord, Jamieson, Recovery, Faceville, Laingkat, Calvary, Reno, Fowlstown, Princes Still, Amsterdam, Branchville, Nickleville, Hinson, Dogtown and Freemont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
